rulesindex.title: Forgotten King - Classic
rulesindex.description: An updated ruleset for playing Super Dungeon Explore, often referred to as version 1.5

rulesindex.title: Forgotten King - Arcade
rulesindex.description: Assume control of a team of heroes and play cooperatively to overcome the automated Consul controlled by cards drawn from the arcade command deck.

rulesindex.title: Forgotten King - FAQ
rulesindex.description: An amendment to the Forgotten King rules that clarify a number of ambiguous items and irregularities.

rulesindex.title: SDE PVP Arena
rulesindex.description: Keep your Heroes in tip-top shape with Super Dungeon: PvP Arena! In PvP Arena two players, each take control of a mighty Warband to decide, once and for all, who is the mightiest Dungeon Explorer!

rulesindex.title: SDE Original Rules
rulesindex.description: The original rules that pit a brave team of heroes against the Consul player who controls all of the evil minions and monsters of Crystalia

rulesindex.title: Super Dungeon 2.0
rulesindex.description: A collection of rulebook downloads including the official Soda Pop rules, together with a collection of custom rulesets written by members of the community.

rulesindex.title: Super Dungeon Legends
rulesindex.description: Want to get involved? Have some material you want to share? Then swing by the forums and join the campfire discussion on the development of this community resource.

rulesindex.title: Lootimeter Mode
rulesindex.description: A rules variant that combines the time pressure of the original SDE game, with the dual hero activation and simplified consul rules from Forgotten King to make a faster more cinematic experience.
